game.name: Train Simulator: South Western Main Line: Southampton - Bournemouth Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Scenic commuter and bustling summer holiday traffic come to life in the South Western Main Line: Southampton – Bournemouth route for Train Simulator!
